name: Family Room
longDesc:
You are in the family room.
The only exit in the room goes to the downstairs hallway.
There is a large window on one of the walls.
The room contains an entertainment system with an old TV and a Nintendo 64.
A toy box is in the far corner of the room.
description:
You are in the family room.
There is only one exit, which goes to the downstairs hallway.

tv.name: tv
tv.description:
The TV is old and has wires popping out of the sides and back,
 but it's all your parents will let you have
tv.discoveryStatement: That copper wire looks like it'll be the easiest to cut.

toy box.name: toy box
toy box.description:
The toy box is empty now, with a note taped inside saying your toys were
 taken away the last time you stole an experiment.

copper wire.name: copper wire
copper wire.description: There is a loose copper wire wrapped in red rubber.

Nintendo 64.name: Nintendo 64
Nintendo 64.description: This is an old, dusty Nintendo 64, a classic gaming system to accompany the aging relic of the TV.
